dmca.title: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. - HB OutPost // Assensi
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: TBryan, HBUSA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, October 07, 2006 2:59 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. - HB OutPost // Assension Networks
Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. -
HB OutPost // Assension Networks
Importance: High




Hello,

I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA
http://www.helbreathusa.com .  I am contacting you in regards to the web
site http://www.unadvised.net , http://www.ascensionnetworks.com/, 

 

The official game site of the developer is located at 
http://www.helbreath.com <http://www.helbreath.com/>  and legally
licensed by http://www.helbreathusa.com <http://www.helbreathusa.com> .
This web site is hosting information and files advertising and how to
connect to their illegal server.  We, iENT, are authorized by the
copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal servers.

 

Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy related
material.  The source code for this game was illegally leaked to the
public, and altered by those not authorized by the copyright holder.

 

The participants are violating the copyright agreement as your servers
are being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse of
our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing this website.

 

For your convenience, a DMA is attached below.

Sincerely,
 
Tamara Bryan
HBUSA, GM1

DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT

 

This DMA is in relation to: The game creators Siementech 
http://www.helbreath.com, legally licensed to IENT 
http://www.helbreathusa.com. 

 

Siementech has registered the Work with the Korean government, and has
been issued two Certificates of Program Registration, Number
110111-0962517 under Article 16 and Clause 1, Article 23 of the
Protection of Software Intellectual Property Rights.  If you will
provide an address, we will be happy to provide copies of the
Certificates to you. 

 

As of October 2002, IENT became the exclusive licensee within the United
States of the Work pursuant to a written agreement between our client
and Siementech.  Under the United States Copyright Act of 1976, our
client has standing to pursue any infringers of the copyright of the
Work within the United States. See, e.g., World Thrust Films, Inc. v.
Int'l Family Entertainment, Inc., 40 U.S.P.Q.2D (BNA) 1281, 1996 U.S.
Dist. LEXIS 16631 (S.D. Fl. 1996) (noting that the exclusive licensee is
the proper party to pursue copyright infringement).

 

 

Web Site Title: Ascension Networks

Web Site URL: http://www.ascensionnetworks.com/

They are claiming copyright, hosting and allowing a copy of the source
code 

 

Direct download available on the left side menu, of their home page. On
their index page speaks of www.helbreathSS.tk
<http://www.helbreathss.tk/> , which was previously hosting this
information and taken down by that host as it was deemed illegal to
host.

 

http://www.xandiumstudios.net/HBServer3.51.zip

http://www.xandiumstudios.net/WLConfig.rar

http://www.xandiumstudios.net/WorldLServer.rar

Above are some of the server files under copyright available and or
illegally edited.

 

Their entire left menu, save the "Pictures" are as above, server files
or illegally edited and being made public by the user. See image below
(attached)

 



 

 

 

IENT Contact Details

 

iENT, 
124 Quade Drive, 
Cary, NC  27513

 

Fax: 919-678-8302   

 

John Ewan

Customer Support Manager, iENT
jewan@ient.com

 

Phil Hall

Vice President / General Manager, iENT
phall@ient.com

 

Tamara Bryan, Myself

Game Master Helbreath USA, iENT

tbryan@ient.com

 

The admin of this particular web site has also posted on our official
forums hosted by Sam Bacsa of netMerc, making personal threats against
my person, as well as the game server of Helbreath USA.  

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my
registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury,
that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the
copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

 

Tamara Bryan


(Please let me know if you need a signed copy faxed through to your
offices and I can arrange that, please include fax number and person to
attention the fax to)
